title: (x) Moulin Rouge - custom designed (by Leslie Cabarga) {Mark S}
content:
The font used for the "M" and "R" look so familiar. I'm stumped.   
   
Help! ![MR](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107140112im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/42453.jpg)
author: samiam

comments.content: It's not a font. Leslie Cabarga drew it. You can see it on [this page](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107140112/http:/www.flashfonts.com/flashsite/logopage.htm). Move your mouse cursor over "Moulin Rouge" in the list on the left side of the page to see it.
Is there anything like it? I thought a saw something like it recently.
Could be, but it doesn't ring any bells with me.
